name: Cyberheart
description:
This is an adventure game created in the RPG Maker_MV version.
It started with "Can I create a classic zelda-like action adventure game with RPG Maker?" and it was produced by five members for 80 hours like game.

we don't have any Developers.

It was an experimental challenge to get game production to market in a limited amount of time, and we included everything we could.

Gameplay only produced the ending part of the entire volume, and was not able to patch the language due to circumstances.

Please download a lot and play and comment.

It's my first time making a game, so I'm not good enough.

Thank you.
